ERNAL] Fw: PO 1281013090-GESA Display-Supply and installation of Furniture for DYSON Riyadh Park, Riyadh KSA - USD 85,251.61/- // INV# GESA20250226 | 1x40HC | DAP CD-10701 STRG-3030
Importance: High

 

URGENT !

 

Hi @Bander Mobarak Al Besher <mailto:Bander.AlBesher@gig.sa> 

 

We would like to request your support in arranging the survey by today or latest by tomm morning hours ( 10am to 2pm )  as we need to arrange delivery of the same to stores tomm 

 

1)      Attached claim form duly completed in all respects

*        Estimate of loss to consider appointment of loss adjuster; - Claim details to follow once the extent of damage is unknown which is possible only after survey

2)      Suppliers Invoice issued prior to loading, identifying the claimed items – Will share after claim report is shared – ref point 1 

3)      Evidence of transit damage (Customs/Stevedores damage report or police report if road accident); there was no Accident – this was loaded on FCL container as mentioned below

4)      Truck Waybill – SEAWAY bill already shared

5)      Drivers ID, license and truck registration card;- why is this needed – moved by Sea & delivered by Shipper’s Clearing agent 

6)      Claim submitted to the responsible parties holding them liable and inviting them for a joint survey (include contact details, proof of sending / acknowledgement and reply, if received); – Notice of damage sent to Shipper’s agent for DAP terms 

7)      Documents showing if the cargo was unloaded from container for customs inspection at the port; - to check  

8)      Vessel arrival date, date of discharge from vessel; Date of customs inspection; Date/ place damage noted – Arrival 25th march / delivery date 17th April ( damage noticed at Chalhob RUH whse )
